cta.story_body_1: ShikkhaGriho was created to bridge the gap between traditional classrooms and the digital future of education in Bangladesh. As learning environments evolve, institutions need structured, reliable, and simple digital tools that enhance - not complicate - the teaching experience.
cta.story_body_2: Inspired by the meaning Home of Education, ShikkhaGriho provides a focused and organized digital space where teachers can manage classrooms efficiently and students can engage meaningfully.
cta.offer_body: ShikkhaGriho combines classroom management, attendance tracking, announcements, and smart member systems into one unified platform. Designed for simplicity and scalability, it allows institutions to transition into digital education seamlessly.
cta.mission_item_1: To simplify digital education by providing a secure and structured classroom platform.
cta.mission_item_2: To empower institutions across Bangladesh with accessible and modern learning tools.
